document.full_text: u.s. stock investors head into this week with added worries about the sustainability of the recent rally and a desire to reduce risk, as shown by the stampede out of commodities on thursday.
document.title: commodities' drop curbs risk appetite
lines_and_colors: u.s. stock investors head into this week with added worries about the sustainability of the recent rally and a desire to reduce risk, as shown by the stampede out of commodities on thursday.
